name: Brain Breaking Balls by Dan
description:
brain breaking balls, by dan

This is the first time I write a program. I'm not a programmer nor do I pretend to be one. Just tried to have some fun during lockdown last year.

The game works fine with MSX TurboR. It can be played at https://webmsx.org/?STATE_URL=https://drive.google.com/u/0/uc?id=1E5T_ajUUHbSP0n...

Instructions. Reach level 3 by letting the balls touch the blue circle. Use space & cursor keys to move circles. Be careful: circles or direction in which they move may change! Thanks!
